product_name: The North Face Free Thinker Bib Shell Pants - Men's
long_description: Rugged and ready, The North Face Free Thinker Bib shell pants are built to withstand demanding use on big, steep mountains, offering highly breathable Gore-Tex Pro protection to keep you dry.
